visual_tags: OUTFIT: Tattered prisoner jumpsuit made of digital noise
EFFECT: RGB color shifting/chromatic aberration surrounds it

description.physical: A humanoid shape made of static, pixelation, and flickering electricity. No distinct face, just a gaping maw.

gemini.prompt:
Create a character portrait in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Upper body portrait (head to waist or chest)
- Neutral expression showing character's personality
- Clean background (solid color or simple gradient)
- High quality, detailed illustration
- Consistent with webtoon/manhwa aesthetic
- Front-facing, looking slightly towards viewer
- Vertical composition suitable for character card


Character: The Glitch (Spirit)
Age: Deceased
Physical appearance: A humanoid shape made of static, pixelation, and flickering electricity. No distinct face, just a gaping maw.
Visual details: OUTFIT: Tattered prisoner jumpsuit made of digital noise, EFFECT: RGB color shifting/chromatic aberration surrounds it, MOTIF: Flickering lights nearby
Personality (for expression): Predatory, chaotic, hungry.
